title: Inflation rate in Russia 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
Inflation rate compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2017, slightly increasing from 2017 to 2019, and finally roughly constant from 2019 to 2022.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 15.53 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 2.88 was reached at Year 2018
